title: Human Nature Natural Health
description: Human Nature Natural Health is a naturopath clinic located in Portsmouth, New Hampshire that focuses on treating 'The Unique Individual That is You!' Whether your goal is healing from a chronic disease, treating cancer, or Lyme Disease or achieving optimum health and aging gracefully, we can help you.
